properties.areaDesc: Intra Coastal Waters from Schoodic Point, ME to Stonington, ME
properties.headline: Heavy Freezing Spray Advisory issued February 18 at 2:59PM EST until February 20 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, south winds 10 to 20 kt
with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 3 to 6 feet. For the Freezing
Spray Advisory, moderate accumulations of freezing spray
expected.

* WHERE...Intra Coastal Waters from Schoodic Point, ME to
Stonington, ME.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 AM EST Wednesday.
For the Freezing Spray Advisory, from 1 AM to 1 PM EST
Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in freezing spray is hazardous.
Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic components
inoperative. Ice accretion on decks and superstructures may
result in some loss of stability. Conditions will be hazardous
to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for accumulation of ice on their vessel
and consider altering plans to avoid or mitigate these hazardous
navigating conditions.

Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... ...FREEZING SPRAY ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM EST THURSDAY
